name: HYPERCRONIUS
description:
HYPERCRONIUS is the very first RPG from Zomia Offline Games! Hearkening back to the golden 16-bit era of gaming with classic graphics and gameplay, HYPERCRONIUS takes you to the distant past…showing you a world on the brink of destruction. Following a group of rebels' escape from genocide, prepare for a story the likes of which you've never experienced in a game before!

FEATURES:

–Classic 16-bit graphics!

–Classic FMV scenes, just like 90's RPG's!

–Classic RPG controls & gameplay!

–DRM-Free!

–Completely uncensored!**

–Unique, engaging storyline!

–The first chapter in a millenniums spanning saga!

–A short, solid RPG experience!

–This game is portable! Install once, take it anywhere!

–Licensed under the BipCot NoGov License: http://bipcot.org/

**This game contains what is conventionally known as "adult content" at various points.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) / 8 and 8.1 (32-bit/64-bit) / Windows® 10 (preview)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive: 600 MB free hard disk space
  • Display Resolution: 640×480
  • Video Card: ATI/AMD or NVIDIA card with 128MB video memory
